page.title: 14Betty MacAlister - age 54.
page.content: This Scotswoman of the year 1984 was born and has lived all her life in the Calton in Glasgow's East End.She is very much involved in her community as a Community Councillor, Chairperson of the Residents Association, Member of the Board of Directors of the Barras Enterprise Trust, Member of the Crime Prevention Panel, Justice of the Peace, volunteer worker in the Calton Neighbourhood Centre and the owner of the Wilton Mussel Shop. She became involved in the aforementioned groups to better the living conditions of her neighbours and improve her local environment. She has found this work both rewarding and worthwhile and has helped bring about and witnessed many of the improvements in her area.
